bank_package

Interface Bank


  • public interface Bank
    Bank Interface defines the methods available to the Bank Proxy and ultimately the customer. the goal is to restrict their access and not give customers the ability to edit balances(aside from making a deposit or withdrawal), add/remove other customers, etc.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAccount(acct.Account newAccount)
      addAccount adds an account object to the bank's account tables and to the appropriate customer's account tables
      boolean addCustomer(bank_package.Customer customer)
      addCustomer adds specific customer to the bank's customer hash table and adds its accounts (if any) to the bank's account hash table
      boolean hasAccount(java.lang.Integer accountNumber)
      hasAccount asks the real bank if it contains the account object associated with the given account number
      boolean hasCustomer(java.util.UUID customerUUID)
      hasCustomer asks the real bank if it contains the customer associated with the given UUID
      boolean removeAccount(java.lang.Integer accountNumber)
      removeAccount removes a specific account from the bank's account hashtable and from the customer's personal account hash table
      bank_package.Customer requestCustomer(java.util.UUID customerUUID)
      requestCustomer requests a single customer object from the real bank using a UUID object
      java.util.Hashtable requestCustomerAccounts(java.util.UUID customerUUID)
      requestCustomerAccounts returns the account hashtable of the customer associated with the given UUID

    • Method Detail

      • addAccount

        void addAccount(acct.Account newAccount)
        addAccount adds an account object to the bank's account tables and to the appropriate customer's account tables
        Parameters:
        newAccount - account object to be added

      • requestCustomer

        bank_package.Customer requestCustomer(java.util.UUID customerUUID)
        requestCustomer requests a single customer object from the real bank using a UUID object
        Parameters:
        customerUUID - UUID object used to locate the correct customer requested
        Returns:
        returns the customer object requested

      • requestCustomerAccounts

        java.util.Hashtable requestCustomerAccounts(java.util.UUID customerUUID)
        requestCustomerAccounts returns the account hashtable of the customer associated with the given UUID
        Parameters:
        customerUUID - UUID used to locate the correct customer and retrieve the correct accounts
        Returns:
        Hashtable object containing Accounts and their associated account numbers as keys.

      • removeAccount

        boolean removeAccount(java.lang.Integer accountNumber)
        removeAccount removes a specific account from the bank's account hashtable and from the customer's personal account hash table
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - account number of the account to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if account successfully removed, false otherwise

      • hasAccount

        boolean hasAccount(java.lang.Integer accountNumber)
        hasAccount asks the real bank if it contains the account object associated with the given account number
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - account number of the requested account
        Returns:
        true if account exists, false otherwise

      • hasCustomer

        boolean hasCustomer(java.util.UUID customerUUID)
        hasCustomer asks the real bank if it contains the customer associated with the given UUID
        Parameters:
        customerUUID - UUID of the requested customer
        Returns:
        true if customer exists, false otherwise

      • addCustomer

        boolean addCustomer(bank_package.Customer customer)
        addCustomer adds specific customer to the bank's customer hash table and adds its accounts (if any) to the bank's account hash table
        Parameters:
        customer - customer object to be added
        Returns:
        returns true if added successfully, false otherwise
